**Describe the feature**

Is there a specific feature you would like to see added to the computer networks guide? Please provide a clear and concise description of the feature you are requesting.

**Why would this be useful?**

Explain why you think this feature would be helpful for learners. For example, "Having a section on network security best practices would be beneficial for students learning about computer networks."
